member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Converts "true", "ok", "yes", "1", "да" to boolean 'true' value. Evrything else to 'false' value.

member.summary: Converts input string to short value.

member.summary: Returns string between 'startString' and 'endString' calculated form 'startFrom'
